C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

containers.name: nats-box
command:
/bin/sh
-ec
nats reply -s nats://$NATS_HOST:4222 'name.>' --command "echo 1" &
"&&"
name=$(nats request -s nats://$NATS_HOST:4222 name.test '' 2>/dev/null)
"&&"
[ $name = test ]

containers.name: cluster-init

controls.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles
